response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we believe its true worth lies in the hands of someone who appreciates its unique qualities. We are offering this masterpiece to you at an exclusive price of $850,000. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to own a piece that could potentially grow in value over time. We trust that you will find it as remarkable as we do. Should you be interested in exploring this further, please let us know. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 850000}
